text: István Géczi (16 March 1944 – 10 September 2018) was a Hungarian football goalkeeper and politician. He played for Ferencvárosi TC.ftcbk.eu: Születésnapi beszélgetés dr. Géczi Istvánnal He was born in Sajóörös, Hungary. He won a silver medal in the 1972 Summer Olympics, and also participated in the 1966 FIFA World Cup and UEFA Euro 1972 for the Hungary national football team. Following the end of his career, he was a member of the Hungarian Parliament in the late 1980s.hetek.hu: Tizenegyes a becsület ellen Géczi died on 10 September 2018 in Budapest from a stroke at the age of 75.Meghalt Géczi István, a Fradi történetének egyik legfontosabb kapusa ==References== Category:1944 births Category:2018 deaths Category:Deaths from stroke Category:Hungarian footballers Category:Hungarian politicians Category:Olympic silver medalists for Hungary
title: István Géczi
